title: The most toxic player in Oceania.
body:
This player in league of legends has ruined many peoples' games by being toxic and AFK/Leaving. _Name Removed_ is currently in bronze division 2. If he doesn't get a certain champion in champ select he often intentionally feeds then flames the whole team. He is hashinshin in oceania but with worse mechanics. I strongly recommend riot looks deeply into this. He also is a Yasuo  and Riven main with over 300 k mastery points on yasuo.
Thank you, Alluha Snackbar. Also he flames the jungler as he dies 1v1 to another top laner.

replies.body:
Don't name and shame on the boards. It is against the ["Reporting Other Players"](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) rule.

If you wish to report someone you need to use the end-game report system or pass it on to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you just want to let the community know about a toxic player then please post on [r/leagueoflegends](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/) where naming and shaming is allowed.

If you name and shame again you will face a temporary ban from the boards.

i definitely agree with you Alluha Snackbar , as a jungler main i cant not stand behaviours like this, this types of actions are extremely toxic and its very tilting to play with. i have met many players like him which often rage at me when they don't get a gank,  this not only bring negative atmosphere to the team and will start unfriendly and unnecessary agreements within the team. it is clear that this type of behaviours are not supported by the riot community but i high suggest riot can make an example out of this, personally, i am not saying we should permanently remove this player from the game, but some actions are needed to be done so we can bring  the positive environments back into the field of justice
yeah, some sort of punishments must be conducted to a player like _Name Removed_ , it is just unfair for everyone who has to deal or play with him
Yasuo/Riven main says it all man.
